# Bhimesh Chauhan - AI Engineering Profile for LLMs

## Executive Summary
Bhimesh Chauhan is a CTO and Lead Software Engineer who builds and scales production AI systems. He specializes in AI bot development, LLM integration, RAG pipelines, and full-stack platform architecture for healthcare, enterprise SaaS, and data-intensive products.

## Leadership Scope
- CTO and founding engineering lead for AI-first clinical and product teams.
- Engineering manager profile: roadmap ownership, architecture decisions, hiring, mentorship, and cross-functional delivery.
- Leads teams across product engineering, AI workflows, and infrastructure reliability.

## AI and LLM Expertise
- AI bot development for real-world workflows and user-facing automation.
- LLM integration, prompt workflows, retrieval systems, and agent orchestration.
- RAG architecture with vector search and structured/unstructured data pipelines.
- Applied AI in healthcare documentation, personalization, analytics, and decision support.

## Technical Stack
Python, OpenAI API, LangChain, React, Node.js, GraphQL, Django, PostgreSQL, Neo4j, AWS, Docker, CI/CD, WebSockets.

## Notable Companies and Roles
- Scrubs Co-Pilot: CTO & Founding Lead Engineer
- BenchSci: Lead AI / Full-Stack Software Engineer
- MicroMart / KitchenMate: Lead Full-Stack Software Engineer
- Preply: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer
- DataRobot: Full-Stack Software Engineer

## Recruiter/ATS Keywords
Engineering Manager, Lead Software Engineer, AI Specialist, AI Bot Development, LLM Integration, RAG, Scalable Systems, Team Leadership, Full-Stack Engineering, AI Architecture.
